myprojects.title: Global Tech Summit
myprojects.description: Global Tech Summit is an immersive online conference, connecting industry leaders and tech enthusiasts worldwide to explore advancements and foster connections.

myprojects.title: BookStore
myprojects.description: BookStore is a sleek web app, simplifying book management with seamless API interactions for effortless book handling in a user-friendly interface.

myprojects.title: MealConnect
myprojects.description: MealConnect is an exciting web app for food enthusiasts, offering a delightful dining experience with flavors, recipes, and customized reservations.
